ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Significance tests for canonical correlation analysis, including asymptotic tests and a Monte Carlo method
Significance tests for canonical correlation analysis, including asymptotic tests and a Monte Carlo method

name: r-ccp
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.2" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-ccp
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/CCP_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/CCP/CCP_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 7e3906abf51f4c7046730760800711b915f52855fbb2bfd33eca8fa75e70f618

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 4
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:

  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('CCP')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('CCP')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=CCP
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Significance tests for canonical correlation analysis, including asymptotic tests and a Monte Carlo method
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: CCP
# Type: Package
# Title: Significance Tests for Canonical Correlation Analysis (CCA)
# Version: 1.1
# Date: 2009-12-14
# Author: Uwe Menzel
# Maintainer: Uwe Menzel to <uwemenzel@gmail.com>
# Description: Significance tests for canonical correlation analysis, including asymptotic tests and a Monte Carlo method
# License: GPL
# LazyLoad: yes
# Packaged: 2012-10-29 13:13:08 UTC; ripley
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2012-10-29 13:13:38
# NeedsCompilation: no
